description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller named HelloController, which provides several endpoints including a welcome message, API documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints such as greeting, documentation redirect, health status, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message to the root endpoint.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Builds and redirects to the Swagger UI URL, preserving original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple string indicating the application's health status.
